schemacrawler.schema

Interface AttributedObject

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BaseColumn<D>, Catalog, Column, ColumnDataType, DatabaseObject, DependantObject<P>, ForeignKey, Function, FunctionColumn, Index, IndexColumn, PartialDatabaseObject, PrimaryKey, Privilege<D>, Procedure, ProcedureColumn, ResultsColumn, Routine, RoutineColumn<R>, Schema, Sequence, Synonym, Table, TableConstraint, TableConstraintColumn, Trigger, View
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCatalogDecorator, SchemaReference

    public interface AttributedObject
    Allow attributes on objects.
    Author:
    Sualeh Fatehi
